title: Tamaperdana
author: Tamaperdana
content: I haven't been active in this forum for almost 10 months, I was too insecure to join, because I thought that at that time I still didn't have much knowledge, so I decided to stop at that time.and time flies, I was the one who wasn't sure about bitcoin, crypto, and this forum.slowly without realizing it, I kept watching bitcoin and this forum, and last week on the 22nd to be exact I ventured to buy bitcoin with the money I had at that time 350 $.and today I will start actively joining and discussing in this forum again.greetings bitcoiners and others.

comments.author: Sakanwa
comments.body: Wow I am so happy to be active again, after I got an issue with my account, I have to try my possible best to make sure my only one account works for me but it keeps showing me unable to log into account, so I just suspended everything, happily yesterday I just tried logging back into my only account, and I was successfully log into my account, and I am so happy being active again, and posting back on all my forums, in this life never fail to start again, because if I gave up on my account, I would have gotten my account back.

comments.author: mk4
comments.body: Quote from: Tamaperdana on December 30, 2022, 11:51:48 PMI was too insecure to join, because I thought that at that time I still didn't have much knowledge, so I decided to stop at that time.Bitcointalk is just a community forum where people talk bitcoin/crypto/security/privacy/etc. Not sure why people take it too seriously as you definitely don't need to.

comments.author: CageMabok
comments.body: Quote from: Tamaperdana on December 30, 2022, 11:51:48 PMI haven't been active in this forum for almost 10 months, I was too insecure to join, because I thought that at that time I still didn't have much knowledge, so I decided to stop at that time.and time flies, I was the one who wasn't sure about bitcoin, crypto, and this forum.slowly without realizing it, I kept watching bitcoin and this forum, and last week on the 22nd to be exact I ventured to buy bitcoin with the money I had at that time 350 $.and today I will start actively joining and discussing in this forum again.greetings bitcoiners and others.Even though you don't have to buy Bitcoin first if you don't know much about Bitcoin, even if the purchase you make is as much as $350 for Bitcoin it's not bad and it's not a problem to make. Because over time you will also trust Bitcoin more after reading and discussing more in this forum for Bitcoin. After all, it is a very natural thing when you don't really believe in Bitcoin when you don't know more about Bitcoin.But by reading more and discussing and also buying Bitcoin with the amount of money you have, I think you have done the right thing because the price of Bitcoin is currently still at a price that is not too expensive and this could be the first try you in Bitcoin and hopefully it will be a very pleasant experience for you. So don't hesitate or hesitate to continue discussing and asking questions in this forum.

comments.author: Solosanz
comments.body: There's no such sanction if you're not active in this forum, so if you're want to be active or not it's your choice. Actually I'm more respect about a user who become a silent reader and learn in this forum rather than spamming and talking non sense. There's many things you can learn from this forum, if you're really worry if you make mistake, just try to minimize it by only posting what you're know and what you understand.

comments.author: israt1@
comments.body: Only you can know something good or bad from forum. Your investment is yours alone. Use forum to know. If you think you want to invest like people say here then you are a big fool. No one will give you back if you cheated. You yourself. Know, understand and value your decision.

comments.author: Aanuoluwatofunmi
comments.body: Quote from: Tamaperdana on December 30, 2022, 11:51:48 PMI haven't been active in this forum for almost 10 months, I was too insecure to join, because I thought that at that time I still didn't have much knowledge, so I decided to stop at that time.and time flies, I was the one who wasn't sure about bitcoin, crypto, and this forum.slowly without realizing it, I kept watching bitcoin and this forum, and last week on the 22nd to be exact I ventured to buy bitcoin with the money I had at that time 350 $.and today I will start actively joining and discussing in this forum again.I can see your account got registered in May and it's about 7 months now of inactivity but am glad you're back again, but it's not about being back but having all it takes to be back again, by bow you would have learnt a little from other sources about bitcoin and also know the differences in cryptocurrency, i will like to suggest that you maintain a good learning ground, read the forum's rules and regulations here, check every related boards of your choice that best suits your taste for discussion and ensure you learnt something from the community here, i wish you all the best in your investment pursuit.

comments.author: Getmon
comments.body: Congratulations on your first bitcoin ownership. Now is a good timing to invest because the price of bitcoin is down after a bullish two years. It is a pleasure to have you here. Additionally, I have numerous real-life friends who continue to read bitcointalk but have not registered. You will discover individuals in bitcointalk investing bitcoin strategically using dollar cost averaging if you continue to read numerous topics and conversations. Converse and do not feel insecure. Happy new year and be yourself.

comments.author: Hyphen(-)
comments.body: Quote from: Tamaperdana on December 30, 2022, 11:51:48 PMI haven't been active in this forum for almost 10 months, I was too insecure to join, because I thought that at that time I still didn't have much knowledge, so I decided to stop at that time.Stopping posting or being inactive in this forum, as you stated, is not the right thing to do due to a lack of knowledge.The ten months you overlooked forum discussion may have been your best time because you would have learned so much from the forum if you had participated in forum Bitcoin discussions. Nonetheless, welcome back to this wonderful forum; I hope you will feel free to ask any questions you may have in order to learn more about it.Quoteand time flies, I was the one who wasn't sure about bitcoin, crypto, and this forum.slowly without realizing it, I kept watching bitcoin and this forum, and last week on the 22nd to be exact I ventured to buy bitcoin with the money I had at that time 350 $.and today I will start actively joining and discussing in this forum again.greetings bitcoiners and others.Congratulations on making your first Bitcoin investment! The market has been down for some time, but I am confident you will get a decent return on your investment.To maintain complete control over your Bitcoin, make sure to withdraw it from the exchange into a wallet that you own and control the private key for.

comments.author: Daniel91
comments.body: OP, welcome to the forum.I see that this is only your third post on the forum.I really don't think there is any reason for anyone to feel intimidated or insecure about posting on this forum.Of course, it is more difficult to write constructive posts until you have enough knowledge about crypto, but you can always ask a question or ask for help.After all, I see that you also wrote 1 post on the Indonesian local board, so I believe that you can get more support there, if you need it.All the best!

comments.author: cryptoaddictchie
comments.body: Its totally up to you actually. Welcome back again, thats a long time off break from forum. I think you can be active without posting that much. Reading some helpful post here might get you different knowledge throughout time. Dont make it a big deal cause forum is just simply a hub. Being a member here doesnt restrict you of anything.

comments.author: Zanab247
comments.body: It's a good thing to be active in the forum and, is another thing thing to study what is going on in the forum without comment or Post in the forum. I guess, you have used this few months to understand so many things about Bitcoin and crypto investments because, is only those that understood the market will know that, investing in Bitcoin in this season is profitable than other cryptocurrencies which you made the right choice by investing a big money on Bitcoin.

comments.author: _morghulis
comments.body: It's not a must that you have to possess some Bitcoin before you can start discussing here in Bitcointalk. We have a handful of users here who don't have any Bitcoin in their possession due to one thing or another and still yet they're actively participating in discussion.Don't treat forum as if it's a do or die situation treat it the same way you treat every other forum.

comments.author: sunsilk
comments.body: Welp, congratulations on that purchase of bitcoin that you've made. You don't have to think a lot and scared by just joining the forum. Whether you've got that much knowledge or not that much, everyone is free to ask and discuss on the forum as long as the discussions are related to the topic of thread per se and the section where it's posted.And with that purchase, it's not going to be the last one that you'll ever do. But if it is then, keep it until the price is too satisfying for you to sell or not to sell until you think that it's the best time to do.

comments.author: Alone055
comments.body: Welcome back! I hope you find the right path of behaving in this forum and don't end up spamming and getting negative tagged or left behind.Happy learning!

comments.author: DeathAngel
comments.body: Good to have you back on the forum, don’t ever feel hesitant about being active here. Just like bitcoin, this forum is for everybody. I’ve said to newbies so many times, this place is so helpful, you can soak up information & learn so much from experienced crypto users here.

comments.author: Shamm
comments.body: Quote from: Tamaperdana on December 30, 2022, 11:51:48 PMI haven't been active in this forum for almost 10 months, I was too insecure to join, because I thought that at that time I still didn't have much knowledge, so I decided to stop at that time.and time flies, I was the one who wasn't sure about bitcoin, crypto, and this forum.slowly without realizing it, I kept watching bitcoin and this forum, and last week on the 22nd to be exact I ventured to buy bitcoin with the money I had at that time 350 $.and today I will start actively joining and discussing in this forum again.greetings bitcoiners and others.I think it's only 7 months bro not a 10months but anyways welcome to again to bitcointalk forum, and also that's a good decision that you will buy a bitcoin worth of 350$. Which is pretty good to start and This forum will take you to the world of crypto which is you can educate yourself through the discussion by our lovely forumates all you need to do is that explores the forum and don't. Make any violations then for sure you can live here for a long time.

comments.author: palle11
comments.body: People do get attracted to something when they have a stake or investment in that thing, so I understand why you feel that way to want to learn and have the knowledge. But for your benefit, it is not only because you have made $350 investment that you should build your interest because you are probably looking at your potential profit from it but it will be wrong to have such straight estimation of profit, some times investment doesn't just go straight. You should just learn and have cryptocurrency knowledge not because of your investment so that you won't always be worked up when your investment is not going in the direction you plan it.

comments.author: Yawa2020
comments.body: I think you're mixing things up. Firstly, you say you don't know much about btc, crypto and even the forum and that was the reason you left until you have money to buy btc. So how can you give a chance when you don't know much about a thing? I think we are here to learn some new things from experts in the forum. Ask whatever you want to know and I'm sure you'll get your answers and recommendations here. You don't really need to own btc before you can be active here.

comments.author: uchegod-21
comments.body: Quote from: Tamaperdana on December 30, 2022, 11:51:48 PM I was the one who wasn't sure about bitcoin, crypto, and this forum.Needless of feeling unsecured in this forum. No one here was born with the knowledge of bitcoin. We didn't come here as experts, rather we learnt and gradually becoming experts.This forum makes experts and your own story won't be different. Congratulations for being active again.
